entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Nullable attributes are missing #7050
  • FontImageSource in iOS does not honor padding in buttons #7047
  • Accessing a contact stored on the device always returns null #7046
  • [Android] Shell BackButtonBehavior binding Command to valid ICommand causes back button to disappear #7045
  • upgrade from dotnet 6 to 7 errors #7040
  • Using SkiaSharp with Maui crashes the app on Android in Release #7037
  • Background color cannot be changed on page #7036
  • CollectionView on Android, SelectionChangedCommand does not get called #7035
  • [Feature Request] Windows Toolbar items Remove the 3 dots to access the toolbar item #7034
  • Shell: Tabs are not displayed correctly in RC 3 (transparent controls, inconsistent behavior) #7033
  • I installed the MAUI workload, but I don't see New Maui project option in VS17.3.0 #7041
  • ListView Context Actions with non-intuitive accessibility on Android #7028
  • [Android] NavigationPage throws InvalidProgramException in Release #7027
    6.0.300
  • How to remove bounce effect in ScrollView #7026
  • Animated gifs are not working properly #7021
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Animated gifs never stop #7020
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Animated gifs do not start initially #7019
    6.0.300-servicing
  • AbsoluteLayout miss align on MacOS and iOS #7018
  • Android app icon not displaying #7017
    6.0.300
  • [iOS] No Background is rendered on Borders with Shadows #7015
  • Expose ApplicationSignificantTimeChange in the lifecycle events and/or MauiUIApplicationDelegate #7012
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] Height of the view inside the CollectionView and extra padding inside the Grid. #7011

Closed

  • Shell on Android: Icons not Shown (RC1) #6361
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] Crash with FlexLayout inside ScrollView #4081
    6.0.300
  • MAUI Blazor installer hangs #5857
    6.0.300
  • .NET MAUI ignores all platforms except Windows #5679
    6.0.300
  • [iOS] [MacCatalyst]: Layout is not invalidated when Visibility is changed for controls using ViewRenderer as Handler #4849
    6.0.300
  • Blazor-MAUI Nav-Menu funky visuals on resize #6942
    .NET 7
  • MAUI Blazor is loading forever on Android 6 #6640
    .NET 7
  • Warn if project contains .razor files but doesn't reference Razor SDK #4536
    .NET 7
  • Inconsistent RoundRectangle CornerRadius Border.ClipShape between Android and iOS #6981
    6.0.300
  • Border rendered incorrectly and shadow not working on Android #5820
    6.0.300-servicing
  • ANDROID: Problem with on release apk not working. #6578
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Failed to launch the iOS remote Simulator #7029
  • ActionSheets do not work in MAUI Windows #7004
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Windows DisplayActionSheet vertical layout is set to fill instead of center #6508
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] Gif image not working in MAUI #5034
    6.0.300
  • Image cannot display device picture. #6918
    6.0.300
  • MenuBarItems Command is not executed. (Verified on Windows) #7024
  • "requestLayout() improperly called" warnings spamming output #6755
    6.0.300
  • Frames cause debug output spam and degrade performance on Android #6606
    6.0.300-servicing
  • CarouselView with direct ContentView items in XAML shows error #7000
  • MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync() is not supported on ios ? #7013
  • ImageButton Image not scaling down by Width- and HeightRequest #4913
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Maui project pre-compiler errors using partial classes with multi-targetting #7005

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid having every access of Bounds or Frame allocate a new Rect #7049
    area/perf 🏎️, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300
  • Update URL for MAUI support #7043
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Housekeeping] Fix issue in Shapes Transform sample #7042
    area/drawing ✏️, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • Update `About Assets` Instructions #7052
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄
  • Template Color updates #7044
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300
  • [android] update AOT profile for `AndroidLinkResources` #7048
    area/app-size 🤏, 6.0.300
  • Observe explicit width/height when measuring ContentView's content #7051
    6.0.300
  • Remove the now-extraneous platform invalidation service; #7039
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300
  • Move Tizen ElmSharp package reference to bundledversions #7030
    area/setup 🪄, 6.0.300
  • Fix Shell Template Colors and Apply Styles to Shell #7031
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.300
  • Disable the AndroidLinkResources optimization #7038
    platform/android 🤖, p/0, area/perf 🏎️, fatal, 6.0.300
  • Fix Shell Footer Measuring and RecyclerView Padding #7010
    area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300
  • Remove platform-specific density calculations from the cross-platform objects #7016
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, control-border, 6.0.300
  • [android] update AOT profile #7007
    platform/android 🤖, 6.0.300
  • Animated gifs cannot/should not be resized #7023
    t/bug, area/single project ☝️, 6.0.300
  • [Windows] Fix DisplayActionSheet #7025
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, control-dialogalert, 6.0.300
  • [iOS] Implement iOS Platform Specifics #5879
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300
  • Fix WinUI fully templated RadioButton #6967
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0.300
  • Remove Frame arrange/measure overrides #6794
    area/layout 🔲, control-frame, 6.0.300
  • Bump templates to be visible in VS 17.3 and up #5626
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄, 6.0.300
  • [Windows] Correctly size the ImageButton BitmapImage #6663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button, 6.0.300
  • [Tizen] Update CollectionView item measure #6974
    area/collectionview 📃, platform/tizen, 6.0.300

Updated

  • [Core] Propagate IsEnabled property from Layouts to childrens #6892
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1210.30 to 1.0.1210.39 #6991
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • BlazorWebView: Allow for WPF and WinForms WebView2 Custom Startup Settings and Fixed Distribution Mode #5086
    area/blazor 🕸️, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Unit tests for FlexLayoutManager #6800
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-servicing
